title: What is the disadvantage of giving sat exams in June? - Quora

response.answer_text: Actually there is no disadvantage. While there can be some advantages like; if you get a sufficient score you can focus more on the profiling and getting your essays right. You can also apple for early admission and early decision in a lot of schools. Good Luck!

Why would there be any disadvantage. There is no advantage or disadvantage in writing the SAT irrespective of when you take it. However, the only problem is that, if you are in 12th and if you are planning for the Fall 2017 intake, then you my fall short of deadline. You will have few universities to apply to and not good universities either.
